website_summaries.verdict: Based on general user feedback, the Adidas PureBoost X TR 2 was a very comfortable training shoe. Commenters lauded the trainer for its lightweight nature, breathable upper, and overall style. Despite the many positive attributes, a minority of people were dissatisfied with the arch support as it caused discomfort. There were also complaints about the heel height. However, it was still a recommended shoe for various activities because of its shock-absorbing Boost midsole.
pros: A great number of Adidas PureBoost X TR 2 owners raved about its comfortability
Many of the consumers adored its style and color options
The shoe was supportive in the arch area, according to numerous wearers
A fair amount of training enthusiasts recommended using it for cross-training, walking, and dancing because of the shock-absorbing platform
The lightweight nature of the shoe pleased some testers
A handful of people claimed that it relieved discomfort in their feet and other parts of the lower extremities
The roomy toe box was appreciated by a few individuals
A couple of reviewers liked the breathable material of the upper
cons: A small number of buyers complained that the PureBoost X TR 2 felt uncomfortable because of the floating arch feature
A few fitness aficionados deemed the heel height unsuitable for cross-training because it felt unstable

customer_reviews.title: WOMEN'S SHOES!
customer_reviews.text: First and foremost: These are WOMEN'S shoes! Not Men's. Order as you would any other Women's size sneaker and they should fit just fine. (PureboostX is a shoe designed for women's feet and are ONLY available in Women's sizes.) Secondly: Check the other buying options! I got some returned ones in perfect, like new condition for about 1/4 the price from the Amazon Warehouse (just had a generic shoes box and no tags). Thirdly: the back of the shoe fits tall so make sure you have socks that will come up high enough that your heel doesn't rub a blister! I'm excited to get running on these!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fake adidas shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these women's shoes because I read the reviews that said it was a woman's size, it's certainly women's size. I give a star because the quality that are not originals, I have 2 pairs of pureboost and you can clearly see the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Monica A.

customer_reviews.title: Not authentic, but still okay
customer_reviews.text: These were definitely not authentic Adidas shoes, but they still worked for what I needed them for. The back of one rubbed for the first few weeks, but they’ve lasted through daily dog walks and runs.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Women’s size, not men’s
customer_reviews.text: These are a women’s size regardless of what the title states. I usually wear a 9.5 in nike and adidas and these are a hair large. I think a 9 would be perfect. Can’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: scarlett7381

customer_reviews.title: Dependable
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of pure boosts and I love them. I work in the medical field and am on my feet sometimes for 12+ hours a day. They're comfortable, easy to get on/off and clean! Also these are womens shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Women’s not men’s
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe but they are women’s so the sizing is incorrect. Returned the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Loruham

customer_reviews.title: I love this style and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I love the comfort of this style shoe. The best walking shoe ever.
customer_reviews.author: Who Dat Nation!!!

customer_reviews.title: pureboost!
customer_reviews.text: i thought i would be disappointed but these shoes are the most comfortable boost so far! I use them everyday and my feet dont hurt..amazing shoes!
customer_reviews.author: ganda ko

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was nice... but husband was unable to wear because it was too small and that is his size. Disappointed for sure.
customer_reviews.author: SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Ordered mens sneakers, got womens
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes, but they are women's sizes when the add clearly states Mens
customer_reviews.author: Anthony F. Alfano II

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not true to its size. Will need to buy extra 1/2 bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Tutiven

customer_reviews.title: misinformation .... WOMENS shoe !!!
customer_reviews.text: this is a WOMENS shoe... will NOT fit a mans foot ... returned !!! the box shows a female icon so... this must be a mislabel of the listing from amazon ....
customer_reviews.author: T S Camp

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: i return it back due to this item not for men it is for women
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed H.

customer_reviews.title: I am wandering the shoes are for man or woman ...
customer_reviews.text: I am wandering the shoes are for man or woman?The size label below maybe is wrong.I am a man,my foot length is 25cm,so I think 7.5 is fit me,but actually I cannot get feet in.
customer_reviews.author: zhang_liangying

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Bought it for my husband, will have to return it and get one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Smith

product_meta.title: adidas mens Pureboost X Tr 2
feature_bullets: boost is our most responsive cushioning ever: The more energy you give, the more you get
Adjustable forefoot and midfoot support for custom comfort and fit
Designed specifically for the contours of a woman's foot; Floating arch to hug and support every step, molding to the shape of your foot
NON MARKING flexible rubber outsole for grip and durability
